::Neody::

Neody finally arrives on the scene, breathing hard from running all the way from the other Destron base. He fires two pods into the ground, watching them bury and tracing them with his mind as they head underground toward one of the stasis cannons on the base.


--- In nbwrpg@y..., Jordan Guthrie <gunthers8@n...> wrote:
> ::Halucigen::
> Halucigen got to the base and doged the beams.  HE began to concentrate 
> on parts of the base and soon bots seemed to appear and begin shooting 
> on the base. (they are all fake so no worrys about damage.)
